language.entry:
Martyr, Bearer of Sins.
Draped in a tattered funeral shroud and wrapped by nameless self-torturing devices, Martyr walks the Earth seeking to carry other’s suffering through his own. He carries no weapon but his raw bare hand. Yet from those blooded, punctured hands, Miracles.

Martyr, Carrier of Suffering.
Martyr bearer other’s suffering with his own. He is able to heal and mend the body and soul of those in his party, but usually come as a suffering of his own. While not a combatant, his touches are still deadly to those creatures of unholy.

Martyr, Holder of Faith.
In the quite darkness of the camp, Martyr performs act of true healing to the faithful. From rising those almost dead, to showing the holy sign of stigmata to the believer, Martyr sparks the flame of faith and mends the body of the broken. Merely tricks, or act of true Miracle? In the darkest dungeon, it matters not.
In the Dinvine's Name Protect You.
My son, you are reborn, again!
I will carry your pain, your Sin.
Back to the dust you came.
Bare your sins, and I will bear yours.
martyr Mod Class Creatured by ActionJack
But.. I saved so many lives!
